title: Zombie Driver THD v1.6 [PD]
description:
Zombie Driver THD has been updated for Tegra 4 and SHIELD! To celebrate the price has temporarily been dropped by 75% - grab it while the offer lasts!

**Notes:**

1) This game requires approximately 1.0 GB of free storage space.
2) New, completely re-designed touch screen controls and vehicle handling! 
Improved controller support. Works great with NVIDIA SHIELD, a USB Xbox 360 controller, PlayStation 3 controllers or one of the Nyko, PowerA/Moga, or Steel Series Bluetooth controller and other Android controllers.

Console-Quality Gaming for your NVIDIA Tegra-Powered Tablet or Smartphone.
Insane mix of cars, speed, explosions, blood and zombies! Fight through an epic narrative campaign or test yourself in the Slaughter and Blood Race modes. 

Engage huge bosses, save survivors, drive crazy vehicles such as a bulldozer, fire truck or even a tank and smash everything in your way. Take part in the Blood Race tournament - chase other cars and take them down without mercy on brutal racing tracks. 

Jump into the Slaughter mode and survive as long as possible on specially crafted arenas.
It's a great game to play on your Google Nexus 7, Asus Transformer Prime, Transformer Infinity, HTC OneX (Tegra), or other NVIDIA Tegra-Powered device.

What's New:

- new, improved touch screen controls and car handling!
- analog stick set as the default control mapping (can be changed in the options menu)
- fixed game pad mapping problems
- fixed corrupted data messages when running out of disk space during content download
- improved stability on some devices
- improved voice overs in some missions
- fixed video playback on some devices

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.exor.ZombieDriver" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.exor.ZombieDriver</a>

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For Tegra-powered devices only - learn more on TegraZone available on Google Play!
